ThreadCallback< T > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class ThreadCallback< T >

A version of Callback but encapsulated into a thread which automatically performs the callback on its Entry function.

See also:
Callback

ThreadCallback< T >::ThreadCallback ( T &  obj,
void(T::*)()  func 
) [inline]

Creates a new callback for object obj calling function func when the thread starts.

Parameters:
obj the object to perform the callback on
func the function name to call when the thread starts

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
void* ThreadCallback< T >::Entry (  )  [inline]

The thread entry function.

This calls the function callback immediately.
